dcterms:creator: W. Hu
M. Fey
M. Zitnik
Y. Dong
H. Ren
B. Liu
M. Catasta
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A citation network of computer science articles, where each paper is provided with an embedding vector of size 128, obtained from average word embeddings of the title and abstract, and categorized into one of the 40 categories.
dcterms:title: Ogbn-arxiv

dcterms:creator: A. K. McCallum
K. Nigam
J. Rennie
K. Seymore
dcterms:description: A relatively small citation network, in which papers are categorized into one of the seven subject categories and is provided with a feature word vector obtained from the content of the paper.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: T. N. Kipf
M. Welling
dcterms:description: A citation network of scientific articles, in which nodes are classified into six classes. The same data split as reported in previous studies is used.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: N. Vakil
H. Amiri
dcterms:description: A large scale dataset for predicting causal relations between genes and diseases from their text descriptions. Each node in the graph is a gene or disease and an edge represents (causal) relation between genes and diseases.
dcterms:title: Gene, Disease, Phenotype Relation (GDPR)

dcterms:creator: D. Sousa
A. Lam√∫rias
F. M. Couto
dcterms:description: A dataset for extracting relations between gene and phenotypes (symptoms) from short sentences. Each node in the graph is a gene, phenotype or disease and an edge represents a relation between its endpoints.
dcterms:title: Gene Phenotype Relation (PGR)
